nodes.text: The Pitann droid gladiatorial games were a sporting contest held on the planet of Pitann that began in 7 ABY. The games were initiated by Senator Sho'ban Do and Uta T'Cha as a cover for Do's plan to create a remote control program to take over all the droids in the Kathol Republic. The games became a point of contention within the Kathol Republic Senatorial Council.

The games were held in an arena in the town of Ghaz Kul IV. Any droid modification was allowed, as long it was only melee weapons. The popularity of the games was massive, and the elite of Pitann, such as senators and mining managers, never missed a contest.
